component.text: Roll over each graphic to view potential installation constraints.
Budget constraints can affect the project by limiting the money available to purchase the equipment needed.
Time constraints on a business may be due to several factors, from the inability to handle down time for transaction processing, to major events happening in a short period of time.
Lack of trained personnel or the need for training could delay an installation.
Resources may be limited. For example, equipment cannot function with the proposed design or the building is not large enough to accommodate the new equipment.
